=== FWTS on Ubuntu 12.04 Alpha1 UEFI 2.3.1 (SDV TM B7 CSMOFF) ===
Tested on 12.04 Alpha1 (12/2/2012) with UEFI 2.3.1 Build SDV TM B7 CSMOFF, downloaded from Intel site. Display now works with GOP, kernel 3.2.0-2-generic. '''Note: Display is garbled after S4 resume. ''' <nowiki>[[attachment:results-fwts-uefi2.3.1-SDV.TM.B7-nocsm.log|Click to download results]]</nowiki>

=== Ubuntu 12.04 on UEFI 2.3.1 with no CSM Boot chart ===
Ubuntu 12.04 build 15-Nov-2011. On Intel(R) Core(TM) i7 CPU @ 2.30GHz. Intel 80GB SSD. Unity 3D desktop with autologin enabled. UEFI 2.3.1 firmware with NO CSM and fastboot enabled boots in under 2.5 seconds (rough stop watch estimate), Ubuntu 12.04 takes 6.5sec on an average, so total boot time from cold boot (Firmware+OS) was on an average 9seconds. 

<nowiki>[[File:uefi-nocsm-precise-20111115-3.png|12.04 Boot chart on UEFI system with no CSM]]</nowiki>
